metadata.name: Knight of the Temple
metadata.description:
Holy knight that learn martial art and holy magic from the church, and been taught to fight by the angel themself. 

After they pass the church trial, they will roam over the land for the pilgrimage. People call them many names such as crusader, holy warrior. And sometimes they been call "Knight Errant" since their journey took them to every corner of the world, they lend a hand to honest folk and purge the evil and Chaos.

Faction "Alliance of Heaven and Mortal"
